description: A longtime veteran of Florida politics, Wiles served as a senior staffer on Trump's campaign, helping guide his path to victory. She will be the first female chief of staff in U.S. history.
title: Donald Trump has chosen Susie Wiles to serve as his chief of staff

description: DIslodged by COVID early in the pandemic, tuberculosis is once again the infectious disease that takes the most lives each year. And the number of cases set a new record. What's going on?
title: TB reclaims title of deadliest infectious disease. That's an 'outrage' says WHO

description: Nearly six weeks after Hurricane Helene slammed into Western North Carolina, radio reporter Jose Sandoval's daily Spanish-language broadcasts have become an essential lifeline for the small but growing Latino community in Western North Carolina, providing information about public services and dispelling misinformation as they piece together their lives.
title: Asheville radio reporter covers Helene's impact for Spanish-speaking communities

description: Control of the House is still too close to call, according to the Associated Press. Here's a running list of races that are still outstanding.
title: Who will control the House? It’s down to these uncalled races

description: With McCormick's victory, Republicans have expanded their Senate majority in the next Congress to 53 seats, with two races still to be called.
title: David McCormick ousts Democratic incumbent Bob Casey to win Pennsylvania Senate race

description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has congratulated Donald Trump on his election victory, saying he is ready to engage with the United States.
title: Putin congratulates Trump and says he's 'ready' to engage in dialogue

description: In 2021, Tanden was nominated to lead the Office of Management and Budget, but she withdrew her nomination after coming under fire from members of Congress.
title: White House advisor Neera Tanden faces Hatch Act complaint over tweets

description: The former president's pending return to the White House could alter the very nature of Medicare, the nearly 60-year-old federal health care program.
title: Trump’s win could accelerate the privatization of Medicare

description: The Federal Reserve cut interest rates by a quarter percentage point. How much further rates fall could depend on how President-elect Trump approaches his second term.
title: The Fed cuts interest rates -- but Trump's election could make things trickier

description: When people can't sleep, they tend to take extreme measures to correct the issue. But that only makes sleep problems worse, say experts. Here are 5 bad habits to avoid when recovering from poor sleep.
title: Your instincts on how to fight insomnia are probably wrong

description: In Savings and Trust, historian Justene Hill Edwards tells the story of the Freedman's Bank. Created for formerly enslaved people following the Civil War, its collapse cost depositors millions.
title: How the 1874 Freedman's Bank collapse connects to economic disparities we see today

description: Civil and immigration rights groups say they are better prepared this time for potential Trump border policies. But they also expressed disappointment with Democrats on immigration issues.
title: Immigrant rights groups ready to challenge President-elect Trump’s policies

description: With a race that was expected to be historically tight behind us, the question is: How did Trump win so decisively?
title: 4 election takeaways — from Democrat and Republican strategists

description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy congratulated Trump and praised his “peace through strength” approach, but concerns in Ukraine loom over Washington's continued commitment to Kyiv.
title: What will Trump's presidency mean for Russia's war on Ukraine?

description: President Biden plans to address the nation on Thursday at 11 a.m. ET to discuss the election results and the transition, the White House told reporters.
title: President Biden will speak this morning following the 2024 election

description: President-elect Donald Trump has won a second term, securing victory in the race against Vice President Harris. Here's a look at how he did it. And, where the federal cases against him stand.
title: How Trump regained the White House. And, where the federal cases against him stand

description: Vice President Harris started her 107-day race buoyed by Democratic optimism, but came up short against former President Donald Trump.
title: Not going back: how Harris failed to turn the page on Trump in her 107-day sprint

description: President-elect Donald Trump has vowed to roll back some of President Biden's signature policies. Here's what Trump's victory means for Biden policies on climate, the civil service and Ukraine.
title: Trump won. Here are 3 Biden priorities under scrutiny

description: If the legislation is passed, social media platforms including X, TikTok, Instagram and Facebook would have one year to work out how to exclude Australian children.
title: Australia proposes social media ban for children under the age of 16

description: Industry Minister François-Philippe Champagne said the decision to dissolve TikTok of its Canadian business  is meant to address risks perceived to be related to TikTok's Chinese parent company.
title: Canada orders TikTok's Canadian business to be dissolved but won't block app
